title: Colin Cowherd Podcast -  Rodgers New Reality, Steelers + Bills Camp Vibes with Tyler Dunne
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast -  Rodgers New Reality, Steelers + Bills Camp Vibes with Tyler Dunne
description:
First, (3:00) Colin reacts to the Nats dealing superstar Juan Soto to the Padres, why laid back San Diego is acting hyper-aggressive like the Yankees or Dodgers, and if the news of the Dolphins tampering with Tom Brady was dumped to distract from the Deshaun Watson suspension. 

Then, NFL Reporter - and GoLongTD Founder - Tyler Dunne joins Colin to discuss the expectations for Aaron Rodgers without Davante Adams (16:00), if Rodgers will finish out his new contract in Green Bay (18:00), if the Vikings under new HC Kevin O’Connell can win the NFC North (23:00), if the Steelers can compete in the AFC North with Mitchell Trubisky or rookie Kenny Pickett (28:00), if the Bills are Super Bowl favorites (36:00), and if Sean McDermott could find himself on the hot seat if Buffalo can’t take the next step (41:00).

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #Herd 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
